commit message:
Merge pull request #1 from jbollacke/master

'Inverse selection' and 'Uncheck all' for app selection activity
Change action bar title for activity
Listen and save proximity for use when there are notifications
If proximity sensor is disabled in settings, do not listen for sensor changes. After every notification, re-register listener in case user has re-enabled proximity sensor in settings
Bump version code for release to market
Disable proximity sensor listener if the user has disabled it in settings
Fix missing configuration for Accessibility listener on pre-Jelly Bean devices
Bump version for Play Store update
Move launching of Activity to xml
Update summaries onCreate and onChange for start and stop times
Added option to turn screen on at full brightness
Add GPL license to project. As requested by @dalb8 in issue #9
Fix errors due to comments...who knew!?
Bump minSdk to 7 PowerManager.isScreenOn requires API level 7 and above
Add experimental feature to open notification tray at user request
Bump targetSdk and version code for release
Add small delay if status-bar preference is true. Solves issue #18
Change PreferenceActivity to FragmentActivity with ListView to solve issue #3. Issue #5 is also solved as a side effect of moving to Loaders from AsyncTask
Add link to app on F-Droid
Do not turn the screen on during phone call, fixes #22
Add check to make sure string.length() > 0, fixes #20
Move all strings into strings.xml, fixes #24
Add translation info to the market description
Force the screen to shut off after specified time, only works when wake length >= 10 seconds
Use ez-loaders via jar file instead of submodule
Remove ez-loaders library reference; target newest Android API
Move to gradle; increase minSdk and remove dependencies
Use number picker for screen wake length time
Set new min and max values for screen wake length
Move billing items to xml array
Bump max screen wake length even higher
Extract billing to seperate method and add some error handling
Use new method to expand status bar on 4.2.2 and up; fixes #36
